attributes.name: action
attributes.description: Defines the action to be taken with directory(ies) specified in directory.

attributes.name: listinfo
attributes.description:
-  all: includes all information in the result set.
    		- name: includes only filenames in the result set.

attributes.name: storeacl
attributes.description:
An array of struct where each struct represents a permission or grant.
Example:
[{email="xxx@yyy.com", permission="full_control"}, {group="all", permission="read"}]

attributes.name: storelocation
attributes.description: Only used for S3 Resources. The location of the created bucket/object. The location can either be EU,US or US-WEST. The default location is US.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
- file: includes only filenames.
    - dir: includes only directory names.
    - all: includes both filenames and directory names.

attributes.name: serverpassword
attributes.description: allow you to access filesystem, also when access is denied for your context

attributes.name: directory
attributes.description: The name of the directory to perform the action against.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
Required for action = "list". Ignored by all other actions. Name of output query for directory
		listing.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description:
Optional for action = "list". Ignored by all other actions. Can be either a wildcard filter,
			e.g. "m*", or a UDF/Closure which accepts the file/directory name and returns a boolean value to indicate
			whether that item should be included in the result or not.

attributes.name: filterDelimiters
attributes.description:
Optional when passing a filter pattern. This value is used as a delimiter for the patterns.
			Default is the pipe "|" character.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description:
Used with action = "Create" to define the permissions for a directory on UNIX and Linux
		platforms. Ignored on Windows. Options correspond to the octal values of the UNIX chmod command. From
		left to right, permissions are assigned for owner, group, and other.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description:
Optional for action = "list". Ignored by all other actions. The query columns by which to sort
		the directory listing. Any combination of columns from query output can be specified in comma-separated list.
		You can specify ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending) as qualifiers for column names. ASC is the default

attributes.name: newDirectory
attributes.description:
Required for action = "rename". Ignored by all other actions. The new name of the directory
		specified in the directory attribute.

attributes.name: destination
attributes.description: Required for action = "copy". Ignored by all other actions. Path of the destination directory. If not an absolute path, it is relative to the source directory.

attributes.name: recurse
attributes.description: Whether Lucee performs the action on subdirectories

attributes.name: nameconflict
attributes.description: When used with action="copy" the possible values are: [Overwrite]|Error.  When used with action="create" the possible values are: [Error]|Skip. Ignored for all other actions.

attributes.name: createPath
attributes.description: if set to false, expects all parent directories to exist, true (default) will generate necessary directories
